name: Neucimar Jerônimo Leite
content: Welcome Neucimar J. Leite Address at the University: Institute of Computing -- IC -- University of Campinas Av. Albert Einstein, 1251 - Cidade UniversitÃ¡ria 13083-852 Campinas, SP - Brazil Phones: +55 19 3521-5873 (office) / 3521-5838 (secretary) E-mail: neucimar@ic.unicamp.br WWW:  http://www.ic.unicamp.br/~neucimar Activities: Professor of undergraduate and graduate courses at (IC - UNICAMP) Interest Areas: Image processing and analysis Mathematical morphology Video images Content-based image retrieval Biometria If you want to learn about image processing (in Portuguese)... Click here for an introduction on low-level image processing and mathematical morphology. You can also read some topics on my ongoing and previous image processing courses. Publications Current courses: undergraduate: MC202 graduate: MO443 Last edited on March 2016 by Neucimar J. Leite
